posts.content: I have recently restored the interior of my Pitt and other members posts have helped a great deal to identify replacement items and patterns, thanks. I have an original table with the 'claw' fastener. The claw mechanism is in place on the table, however the mahogany support and and claw catch is missing. I would be grateful for those owners with the these items fitted to their Pitts for patterns/dimensions so I may fabricate replacements.

author.location: Essex but I'm nothing like the twats on the telly.

posts.content:
Pm me an email address and I will send you some pics of the bit the claw hooks into and the measurements for the wood on the long side. Are you going to Action as I will be there if you want to have a look and a measure up. Of the wood and the catches that is

Shalom, Lee.
